question: Special Accelerated Road Development Programme (SARDP-NE) is for development of road network in:
explanation: Special Accelerated Road Development Programme (SARDP-NE) is for development of road network in the north eastern states of India. The programme envisages providing road connectivity to all the district headquarters in the north eastern region by minimum 2 lane highway standards apart from providing road connectivity to backward and remote areas, areas of strategic importance and neighbouring countries.
